events.message: I received the wrong item and I want to request a refund because I do not want to keep this product.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number?
Here is the photo of the product I got, and my order number is 123456. Please process the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund processing. I appreciate the support.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Hi, just following up to ensure that your refund was received and if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund issue is resolved to your satisfaction, we are closing this support case now. Thank you!
